title: HTMX: My next step into frameworkless web development
summary: After building this blog site without a framework, I'm very excited to explore building web applications without a framework. Something I realized while building the site is that using HTML to record the state of the application is a very intuitive way to build (at the very least) simple web apps. I want to explore using HTMX, as this idea appears to be at it's core.
